text: The Bama Boyz (a.k.a the Bamaz) are a Grammy-nominated, Dove Award winning, American record production, songwriting, and artist trio, with Eddie “E-Trez” Smith III, Jesse J. Rankins, Jonathan D. Wells as members. Category:Musical groups from Alabama Category:Hip hop bands Category:Montgomery, Alabama Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Alabama
title: Bama Boyz
